text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for Gingka’s body. Draw his head. Add a line, which will act as the center of it.
Add guidelines for Hagane’s arms, legs and band.
Outline the shapes for Gingka’s arms, legs and band.
Sketch his hands, hair, shoes and wings.
Carefully draw Gingka’s hair, clothes and wings.
Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Gingka Hagane, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail and add the ground. Erase all guidelines.
